author: IGN
description:
Leveling up Preppers in Death Stranding 2 is more rewarding than ever, with every rank unlocking new gear, APAS upgrades, and helpful tech for Sam’s journey. In this guide, we’ll break down the best ways to farm likes and hit 5-star rank with any Prepper you're targeting.

We’ll show you how to use Order Filtering, spot repeatable deliveries, complete Aid Requests, and make the most of Lost Cargo with smart tools like Sticky Guns and Pickup Off-Roaders. We’ll also cover how to grind enemy camps and BT zones, plus passive tricks using Shared Cargo and other porters.

00:00 - Intro  
00:35 - Order Filtering  
01:32 - Aid Requests  
02:05 - Retrieving Lost Cargo  
04:17 - Passive Ways to Earn Likes

#IGN #Gaming
title: Death Stranding 2: The Best Ways to Level Up Preppers QUICKLY

author: IGN
description:
Once Human's Annual Version 2.0: Dreamveil Live Now!

PvE scenario Endless Dream, the new class system, whimsical casual modes in the Dreamland Wonder Event, generous rewards, and more surprises are all waiting for you to explore!

Download and Play Free Now for Exclusive Rewards:
https://oncehuman.onelink.me/0Y6K/626fbus

Presented by Once Human
title: Once Human 2025 Global Annual Showcase

author: IGN
description: In Relay, Riz Ahmed plays a world-class "fixer" who specializes in brokering lucrative payoffs between corrupt corporations and the individuals who threaten their ruin. He keeps his identity a secret through meticulous planning and always follows an exacting set of rules. But when a message arrives one day from a potential client (Lily James) needing his protection just to stay alive, the rules quickly start to change.
title: Relay - Official Trailer (2025) Lily James, Riz Ahmed, Sam Worthington

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Announcement Trailer for Mirealle, a relaxing puzzle adventure game developed by qovagames. Players will explore a world split into a number of floating islands and get to the bottom of the forgotten history hidden in the ruins. Traverse through a suite of diverse levels as Ayra, who's on a relaxing and cozy journey to solve the puzzles of the environment and fulfill an ancient prophecy. Mirealle is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mirealle - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
You can’t do much of anything in Death Stranding 2 without chiral crystals. From fabricating equipment, to building roads and monorails, to mining, and even using floating carriers, chiral crystals make this sad, desolate world go ‘round. And if you’re anything like us, they’ll often be the bottleneck you have to squeeze through in order to get what you want done. Here’s some of the best ways to get chiral crystals in Death Stranding 2: On the Beach.
Timecodes

00:00 - Intro
00:42 - Pull From Facilities
01:16 - Take From Tar Pits
02:33 - Set Map Filters To Find Later Game BT Areas
03:20 - Ghost Mech Facility

#IGN #Gaming
title: Death Stranding 2: Get TONS of Chiral Crystals Fast | Best Crystal Locations

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Announcement Trailer for My Hero Academia: Alls Justice developed by Bandi Namco. Players will embody the great cast of My Hero Academia and partake in action-packed battles inspired by the manga and series. My Hero Academia: Alls Justice is coming to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: My Hero Academia: Alls Justice - Official Announcement Trailer (4K) | Bandai Namco Summer Showcase

author: IGN
description: The Muay Thai master, Fakhumram, is coming to Tekken 8. Check out the breakdown with developer Michael Murray, as he talks about character inspiration, influences, and the process behind bringing the fan favorite to the latest entry of Tekken. Fahkumram comes to Tekken 8 on Steam, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series consoles on July 11.
title: Tekken 8 - Fahkumram Character Developer Overview | Bandai Namco Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Watch the Part 1 DLC Features Overview Trailer for Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot Daima Adventures Through The Demon Realm, a two-part DLC for the hit 3D arcade anime fighter developed by CyberConnect2. Players can get the rundown on new features coming to the DLC pertaining to story, gameplay, and more. Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot Daima Adventures Through The Demon Realm's Part 1 DLC is launching on July 17 with Part 2 coming soon for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
title: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot Daima Adventures Through The Demon Realm - Part 1 DLC Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Season 3 Trailer for The Proud Family: Louder and Prouder, a family comedy series distributed by Disney. Get a glimpse at the new season giving a look into the trials, tribulations, and triumphs of The Proud Family. The Proud Family: Louder and Prouder is streaming Season 3 on August 6 exclusively on Disney+.

#IGN #Disney
title: The Proud Family: Louder and Prouder - Official Season 3 Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description: Watch the developers at Rebel Wolves discuss their new third-person action-adventure RPG with The Blood of Dawnwalker. Hear about new gameplay features, the day and night mechanics of the dual role of the protagonist, and more. The Blood of Dawnwalker is launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: The Blood of Dawnwalker - Developer Overview | Bandai Namco Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Check out the Story Trailer for The Blood of Dawnwalker, an upcoming third-person action adventure RPG developed by Rebel Wolves. Players will become human by day, and vampire by night to shape the story of the game through the deep 14th-century European setting. The Blood of Dawnwalker is launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: The Blood of Dawnwalker - Story Trailer | Bandai Namco Summer Showcase 2025

description: Check out the release gameplay overview trailer for Super Robot Wars Y, developed by Bandai Namco Forge Digitals Inc. Take control of units and pilots from different anime in this grid-based tactial RPG when it comes to PC, Switch, and PS5 on August 28, 2025.
title: Super Robot Wars Y - Gameplay Trailer | Bandai Namco Summer Showcase 2025

description: Hear from the development team on the brand-new action fighter My Hero Academia: Alls Justice. Get the rundown on features, mechanics, and more for My Hero Academia: Alls Justice, coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: My Hero Academia: Alls Justice - Developer Overview Trailer | Bandai Namco Summer Showcase 2025

description: Check out the official trailer for Code Vein II, which dives into what you can expect from the vampiric follow-up. Travel 100 years into the past and fight revenents across time in this third-person action game. Code Vein II comes to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series consoles, and Steam in 2026.
title: Code Vein II - Development Overview Trailer | Bandai Namco Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Daevos Introduction Trailer for G-Rebels, a sci-fi open-world dystopian flight simulation game developed by Reakktor Studios. Get acquainted with the region of Daevos, the capital city of the Okktane Empire, where players will engage in intense dogfights in the cockpit, set against a backdrop of flickering neon lights and endless skyscrapers. Explore more of Daevos in G-Rebels, coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: G-Rebels - Official Daevos Introduction Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Step into Endless Bounty Hunter as Inor Wan chases Cyra across warped timelines. Find hidden branches on the map, awaken them, and reform Yin and Yang to escape safely with treasure in tow and secrets revealed. This is NARAKA: Bladepoint's new extraction game mode - Rift Traversal.

Launching July 8 PT on PC Playtest. (Note: PS5 and Xbox versions coming this summer)

Presented by: NARAKA: Bladepoint

#IGN
title: Naraka: Bladepoint's New Extraction Mode - Rift Traversal

author: IGN
description: Get a behind-the-scenes look at the art vision for the Valley of Mines in this latest Gothic 1 Remake trailer for the upcoming action RPG. The Making of: Chapter 3 of Gothic 1 Remake will be coming next week. Gothic 1 Remake will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X|S.
title: Gothic 1 Remake - Official Art Vision Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: The H125-2024 Max Flight Stick is one of the nicest pieces of hardware I've ever gotten my hands on. While it's a little finicky to set up in Windows, once you take to the air it offers incredible realism and a rugged, industrial-quality build. If you're serious about flying simulated helicopters and want to get as close to the real thing as possible, the H125-2024 is a great choice but be warned: it doesn't come cheap.
title: H125-2024 Max Flight Stick Helicopter Controls Review

author: IGN
description: 9 Years of Shadows, the pixel-art metroidvania already with good reviews on PC, is on its way to PlayStation and Xbox platforms on July 31. Check out this new console release date trailer.
title: 9 Years of Shadows: Official Console Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Fantastic First Look' Featurette for The Fantastic Four: First Steps, the next installment in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and introduction to Marvel's first family distributed by Marvel Studios Join the of the film Matt Shakman and Marvel Studios head Kevin Fiege on the process of bringing The Fantastic Four to the silevr screen for the first time in the MCU. The Fantastic Four: First Steps releases in theaters on July 25.

The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, and Julia Garner. The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters on July 25, 2025.

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their mo
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official 'Fantastic First Look' Behind the Scenes Clip (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Franchise Mode Deep Dive Trailer for Madden NFL 26, the upcoming addition to the hit American football simulation game developed by EA Sports. Players can get the rundown on the updates, changes, and features to the new Franchise Mode in the game. Choose new Coach archetypes, prepare for the upcoming games, and shape the season how you see fit. Play Franchise Mode in Madden NFL 26, launching on August 14 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC.

#MaddenNFL26 #Gaming #IGN
title: Madden NFL 26 - Official Franchise Mode Deep Dive Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Jaxen (Michael Jai White, who also directed), a former cop turned Atlanta PI, is hired to find missing R&B star Jahari. His investigation uncovers her disappearance is connected to a larger conspiracy, forcing him to question those around him and his own past. 

Cliff "Method Man" Smith, La La Anthony, Orlando Jones, and Mike Epps co-star. Samuel Goldwyn Films will release Trouble Man in US theaters on August 15, 2025.
title: Trouble Man: Exclusive Trailer (2025) Michael Jai White, Method Man

author: IGN
description:
Meet Phoenix and see the character in action in this latest Marvel Rivals trailer for the superhero team-based PVP shooter game. Phoenix will be available in Marvel Rivals when Season 3: The Abyss Awakens begins on July 11, 2025 (UTC) on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S.

Omega-level telepath and original X-Men, Jean Grey soars to cosmic heights when bonded with the Phoenix Force — the embodiment of creation itself. Now, she travels the stars as both savior and destroyer, confronting the darkness at its source: Knull, the King in Black.

#MarvelRivals #Gaming #IGN
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Phoenix: Fire and Life Incarnate Character Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the NieR: Automata Crossover Trailer for The First Descendant, a third-person free-to-play action RPG shooter developed by NEXON Games. Players can embody the legendary androids of 2B and A2 in The First Descendant as playable skins. Acquire their signature animations and exclusive cosmetics with the upcoming Breakthrough update. The NieR: Automata Crossover skins arrive to The First Descendant with the Breakthrough Update on August 7 for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 5 Pro, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#TheFirstDescendant #NieRAutomata #Gaming
title: The First Descendant x NieR: Automata - Official Crossover Trailer

author: IGN
description: On today's Daily Fix, Capcom and Legendary have reportedly cast David Dastmalchian as M. Bison in their upcoming live-action Street Fighter movie, set to release in 2026. Dastmalchian joins a cast that includes Jason Momoa as Blanka, Noah Centineo as Ken, Roman Reigns as Akuma, Andrew Koji as Ryu, Orville Peck as Vega, Callina Liang as Chun-Li, and 50 Cent as Balrog. Meanwhile, Nintendo has officially confirmed that the developers behind Super Mario Odyssey are working on Donkey Kong Bonanza, making it the next big 3D platformer for the Switch 2. And finally, Red Dead Online has received its first major update since 2021, featuring four new “Strange Tales” missions and a new zombie-infected mode, hinting at more content on the way.
title: M. Bison Officially Cast In Live-Action Street Fighter Movie | IGN Daily The Fix

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Bandai Namco Summer Showcase featuring the latest trailers for some of the most anticipated games like Blood of the Dawnwalker, Tekken 8, Digimon Story: Time Stranger, an all new My Hero Academia game and so much more! Tune in on Wednesday July 2, 2025 at 12PM PT! 

#IGN #Gaming
title: Bandai Namco Summer Showcase 2025 Livestream
